cwitools.science module¶

CWITools Science Functions Library.

This module contains functions for use in scientific analysis or the generation of scientific products from data cubes (such as pseudo-NarrowBand images).

cwitools.science.reverse_colourmap(cmap, name='my_cmap_r')¶

In: cmap, name Out: my_cmap_r

Explanation: t[0] goes from 0 to 1 row i: x y0 y1 -> t[0] t[1] t[2]

/

/

row i+1: x y0 y1 -> t[n] t[1] t[2]

so the inverse should do the same: row i+1: x y1 y0 -> 1-t[0] t[2] t[1]

/

/

row i: x y1 y0 -> 1-t[n] t[2] t[1]
